title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - The dialog details have the following issues:

i. There is duplicated name validation on the first page.
ii. The first and second column should be merged.

OB: No observed behavior mentioned.

EB: The bug report mentions the following expected behaviors:

1. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.
2. The table should have a label so that it can contain a mnemonic.
3. Multiple selection should be allowed, as 'move up' and 'move down' can be applied to more than one item.
4. The signature preview must be a label that wraps.
5. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.

SR: To reproduce the bug, perform the following steps:

1. Change a parameter name to something very long.
2. Observe that the preview is cut off.
